verses.verse: The wonders of redeeming love Our highest thoughts exceed; The Son of God comes from above For sinful man to bleed.
He gives Himself, His life, His all, A sinless sacrifice. For man He drains the cup of gall, For man the victim dies.
And now before His Father's face His precious blood He pleads; For those who seek the throne of grace His lovee still intercedes.
He knows the frailties of our frame, For He has borne our grief; Our great High Priest once felt the same, And He can send relief.
His love will not be satisfied, Till He in glory sees The faithful ones for whom He died From sin forever free.
